title: MapAgorg Dashboard
text:
This dashboard visualizes the geography of civic infrastructure and opportunity in the United States.
Explore counts and classifications of civic opportunity organizations by ZIP code and county.




ğŸ‘‰ Use the Explore Map tab to interact with civic opportunity data.
ğŸ“Š Data includes counts, per capita rates, and classifications

title: MapAgorg Dashboard
text:
ğŸ‘‰ Use the Explore Map tab to interact with civic opportunity data.
ğŸ“Š Data includes counts, per capita rates, and classifications

title: Civic Opportunity Map
text:
Load packages
if (!requireNamespace(â€œpacmanâ€, quietly = TRUE)) install.packages(â€œpacmanâ€) pacman::p_load(leaflet, glue, sf, tigris, tidyverse, here, htmlwidgets, viridis, DT)


Load and prepare data
df <- read.csv(here::here(â€œraw_dataâ€, â€œcnty_counts_cov.csvâ€)) df\(fips <- sprintf("%05d", df\)FIPS)
counties <- readr::read_rds(here::here(â€œraw_dataâ€, â€œcounties.rdsâ€)) states <- readr::read_rds(here::here(â€œraw_dataâ€, â€œstates.rdsâ€))
map_data <- left_join(counties, df, by = c(â€œGEOIDâ€ = â€œfipsâ€)) %>% st_as_sf() %>% st_transform(crs = st_crs(states)) %>% mutate( civic_opp_category = ntile(civic_opp_sum_normalized, 5), county_info = glue(â€œ{NAMELSAD}Civic opportunity index: {round(civic_opp_index, 2)}Civic orgs per 1k: {round(civic_opp_sum_normalized, 2)}â€) )


Define color palette
pal_green <- colorFactor(viridis(5), domain = map_data$civic_opp_category)


Render map
leaflet(map_data, options = leafletOptions(minZoom = 3)) %>% addProviderTiles(â€œCartoDB.Positronâ€) %>% addPolygons( fillColor = ~pal_green(civic_opp_category), fillOpacity = 0.7, color = â€œ#BDBDC1â€, weight = 1, popup = ~county_info, group = â€œCountiesâ€ ) %>% addPolygons( data = states, color = â€œblackâ€, weight = 2, fillOpacity = 0, group = â€œStatesâ€, options = pathOptions(clickable = FALSE) ) %>% addLegend( pal = pal_green, values = map_data$civic_opp_category, title = â€œCivic Opportunity Indexâ€, position = â€œbottomrightâ€ ) %>% addScaleBar(position = â€œbottomleftâ€) %>% addEasyButton( easyButton( icon = â€œfa-globeâ€, title = â€œReset Zoomâ€, onClick = JS(â€œfunction(btn, map){ map.setView([37.0902, -95.7129], 4); }â€) ) ) %>% addMouseCoordinates() %>% # Mouse coordinates control setView(lng = -95.7129, lat = 37.0902, zoom = 4) %>% # Remove default zoom and geolocation control: removeControl(â€œzoomâ€) %>% removeControl(â€œgeolocateâ€)

title: About
text:
This dashboard is powered by the MapAgora datasets, created from IRS Form 990 data and large-scale digital trace classification.

Author: Jae Yeon Kim and Milan de Vries
Source: MapAgora GitHub
